pr_title: [CALCITE-3929] When deserialize UDAF aggregate call from json string,…

timeline.message: [CALCITE-3929] When deserialize UDAF aggregate call from json string, throws NPE (Xu Zhaohui)

timeline.bodyText: Where is this class attribute used? It doesn't seem to be in RelJsonWriter#toAggCall.
timeline.author: michaelmior

replies.bodyText:
Thank you for your comments. This is a problem of lack of class information during udaf serialization. When we deserialize udaf, we will try to load udaf function through class attribute[1].If we can't load SqlAggregateFunction correctly, there will be an exception when creating AggregateCall.
[1]RelJson#toOp
replies.author: xy2953396112
yanlin-Lynn

timeline.bodyText: I don't think class info is needed for system aggregate function
timeline.author: yanlin-Lynn

replies.bodyText: You are right. Code has been updated.
replies.author: xy2953396112

timeline.bodyText: extends SqlUserDefinedAggFunction might be better for your case
timeline.author: yanlin-Lynn

replies.bodyText:
@yanlin-Lynn
Thanks, SqlUserDefinedAggFunction  has an AggregateFunction argument, it's not convenient for reproduce this case.So it's better to extends SqlAggFunction and define it as a user-defined function.
replies.author: xy2953396112
